column5: I returned to college and I have a few courses that require ladder logic both rely and plc I'm looking for help with this stuff if your any good let me know e-mail me at [emailÂ protected]

ahhh!!  programmable logics controllers  I love them aced the courses in school  actually my graduating project was a automated ice fishing tip-up, techer said it would not work  showed him LOL!!!  a few switches, led, electric motor, piezo buzzer a simple program if/then/else(assembler) and voila!!!  A plus, and it worked for real  field tested on scugog and caught a walleye
